title: Gifting issues (Gift not received)
body:
Hi, 
I gifted a skin to my friend just this afternoon, but she still hasn't received the skin and I got charged for the gift. Can someone help me on this issueï¼Ÿ

replies.body: Is this still an issue?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if your friend hasn't received the gift yet.  We prefer to help with account-sensitive questions individually through a private venue.  We'll be happy to take a look!
